divs: sighting detailsmy wife and i was lucky to have a suite and on the balcony we looked out towards the islands before arriving in bermuda. we saw a bronze\gold light that buzzed back and forth and up and down. i was able to get one picture. the blue dot in the middle is my camera.
Summary: Aboard the Norwegian Dawn Cruise Ship in the tip of the bermuda triangle.
